thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1754
thread.title: Syrah

author: Syrah
title: Syrah
text:
The site is easy to use and I like that it doesn't ask me to compare with other sites. I've called their customer service and few times and they were always courteous and informed.
Sometimes, when I deselect time blocks for arrival and departure, I have to deselect one by one instead of multiple choices to narrow the search. It takes a bit of time to refresh but I do eventually get the results I want.
I like the fact that FlightHub is Canadian. :-)
